name: Fresh Organic Apples
description: Premium crisp red apples from local farms. Perfect for snacking or baking. Rich in vitamins and fiber. Naturally sweet and crunchy.

name: Organic Bananas
description: Sweet organic bananas hand-picked at peak ripeness. Great source of potassium and energy. Perfect for smoothies, breakfast, or healthy snacks.

name: Premium Whole Milk
description: Fresh whole milk from grass-fed cows. Rich, creamy taste with essential vitamins A and D. Perfect for drinking, cooking, and baking.

name: Artisan Whole Wheat Bread
description: Freshly baked whole wheat bread made daily. Soft texture with hearty grain flavor. No artificial preservatives. Perfect for sandwiches and toast.

name: Free-Range Brown Eggs
description: Farm fresh free-range eggs from happy hens. Rich in protein and omega-3. Large grade AA quality. Perfect for any meal of the day.

name: Fresh Squeezed Orange Juice
description: 100% pure orange juice with no added sugar. Packed with vitamin C and natural goodness. Cold-pressed for maximum flavor and nutrients.

name: Premium Chicken Breast
description: Hormone-free chicken breast, skinless and boneless. High in protein, low in fat. Perfectly sized portions for healthy meals and meal prep.

name: Italian Penne Pasta
description: Authentic Italian durum wheat pasta. Perfect al dente texture. Great for any sauce. Cooks in 8-10 minutes. Family-size 500g package.

name: Vine-Ripened Tomatoes
description: Juicy vine-ripened tomatoes bursting with flavor. Grown locally with care. Rich in lycopene and vitamins. Perfect for salads, sauces, and cooking.

name: Aged Cheddar Cheese
description: Premium aged cheddar with bold, sharp flavor. Perfect for cheese boards, sandwiches, or grating. Made from high-quality milk. 250g block.

name: Fresh Strawberries
description: Sweet, juicy strawberries at peak ripeness. Handpicked for quality. Loaded with vitamin C and antioxidants. Perfect for desserts or snacking.

name: Organic Baby Spinach
description: Fresh organic baby spinach leaves. Tender and nutrient-packed. Great for salads, smoothies, or cooking. Pre-washed and ready to eat.

name: Wild Caught Salmon
description: Premium wild-caught salmon fillet. Rich in omega-3 fatty acids. Firm texture and delicate flavor. Sustainably sourced. Perfect for grilling or baking.

name: Greek Yogurt
description: Thick and creamy Greek yogurt. High in protein, low in sugar. Perfect for breakfast with granola or as a healthy snack. 500g container.

name: Avocados
description: Perfectly ripe Hass avocados. Creamy texture and rich taste. Packed with healthy fats and fiber. Great for toast, salads, or guacamole.
